languages.text: "Страшная участь — зачахнуть в плену, вдали от бранного поля. Мне было б стыдно взглянуть в глаза Всеотцу, встреть я подобный конец".

traits.locale_text: "Страшная участь — зачахнуть в плену, вдали от бранного поля. Мне было б стыдно взглянуть в глаза Всеотцу, встреть я подобный конец".

languages.text: "It is a terrible fate to wither in captivity, away from the battlefield. I would be ashamed to look into the Allfather's eyes were I to meet such an end."
languages.original_text: "Страшная участь — зачахнуть в плену, вдали от бранного поля. Мне было б стыдно взглянуть в глаза Всеотцу, встреть я подобный конец".

traits.locale_text: "It is a terrible fate to wither in captivity, away from the battlefield. I would be ashamed to look into the Allfather's eyes were I to meet such an end."
"It is a terrible fate to wither in captivity, away from the battlefield. I would be ashamed to look into the Allfather's eyes were I to meet such an end."
"It is a terrible fate to wither in captivity, away from the battlefield. I would be ashamed to look into the Allfather's eyes were I to meet such an end."

"It is a terrible fate to wither in captivity, away from the battlefield. I would be ashamed to look into the Allfather's eyes were I to meet such an end."
"It is a terrible fate to wither in captivity, away from the battlefield. I would be ashamed to look into the Allfather's eyes were I to meet such an end."

languages.text: 「戦場から遠く離れ、囚われのまま朽ち果てるとは、なんと無惨な最期だろう。もしそんな死に方をすれば、俺は全知の父の御顔を直視することすら恥ずかしく思うだろう」
languages.original_text: "It is a terrible fate to wither in captivity, away from the battlefield. I would be ashamed to look into the Allfather's eyes were I to meet such an end."

traits.locale_text: 「戦場から遠く離れ、囚われのまま朽ち果てるとは、なんと無惨な最期だろう。もしそんな死に方をすれば、俺は全知の父の御顔を直視することすら恥ずかしく思うだろう」

languages.text: "Es ist ein grauenhaftes Schicksal, in der Gefangenschaft zu verkümmern, fern vom Schlachtfeld. Ich würde mich schämen, dem Allvater in die Augen zu blicken, würde ich einen solchen Tod finden."
languages.original_text: "It is a terrible fate to wither in captivity, away from the battlefield. I would be ashamed to look into the Allfather's eyes were I to meet such an end."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist ein grauenhaftes Schicksal, in der Gefangenschaft zu verkümmern, fern vom Schlachtfeld. Ich würde mich schämen, dem Allvater in die Augen zu blicken, würde ich einen solchen Tod finden."

languages.text: « En effet, c'est un sort terrible que de dépérir en captivité, loin du champ de bataille. J'aurais honte de regarder le Père de Tous dans les yeux si je devais finir ainsi. »
languages.original_text: "It is a terrible fate to wither in captivity, away from the battlefield. I would be ashamed to look into the Allfather's eyes were I to meet such an end."

traits.locale_text: « En effet, c'est un sort terrible que de dépérir en captivité, loin du champ de bataille. J'aurais honte de regarder le Père de Tous dans les yeux si je devais finir ainsi. »

languages.text: «Es un sino terrible marchitarse en cautiverio, lejos del campo de batalla. Si me aconteciera tal fin, me avergonzaría mirar a los ojos del Padre de Todo».
languages.original_text: "It is a terrible fate to wither in captivity, away from the battlefield. I would be ashamed to look into the Allfather's eyes were I to meet such an end."

traits.locale_text: «Es un sino terrible marchitarse en cautiverio, lejos del campo de batalla. Si me aconteciera tal fin, me avergonzaría mirar a los ojos del Padre de Todo».

languages.text: “遭到囚禁，远离战场，枯萎而死。如果我沦落到了这种地步，我恐怕都不敢鼓起勇气直视全父的双眼。”
languages.original_text: "It is a terrible fate to wither in captivity, away from the battlefield. I would be ashamed to look into the Allfather's eyes were I to meet such an end."

traits.locale_text: “遭到囚禁，远离战场，枯萎而死。如果我沦落到了这种地步，我恐怕都不敢鼓起勇气直视全父的双眼。”

languages.text: "Cepheden uzakta, esaret altında göçüp gitmek ne hazin bir kader. Bana nasip olsa utancımdan Yücebaba'nın gözlerine bakamam."
languages.original_text: "It is a terrible fate to wither in captivity, away from the battlefield. I would be ashamed to look into the Allfather's eyes were I to meet such an end."

traits.locale_text: "Cepheden uzakta, esaret altında yenik düşmek ne hazin bir kader. Bana nasip olsa utancımdan Yücebaba'nın gözlerine bakamam."

languages.original_text: "It is a terrible fate to wither in captivity, away from the battlefield. I would be ashamed to look into the Allfather's eyes were I to meet such an end."
